header: How would you like to be paid?
p: We can only pay your State Pension into your personal or joint bank or building society account.

paymentMethod.fieldset: How would you like to be paid?
paymentMethod.label-display: How would you like to be paid?

errors.required: Select whether you would like to be paid into a bank or a building society account.

errors.format: Name must start with a letter and only include letters a to z, hyphens, apostrophes, full stops, spaces and ampersands.
errors.length: Name must be 70 characters or less.

errors.format: Enter a sort code in the correct format, like 11 22 33.
errors.length: Enter a sort code in the correct format, like 11 22 33.

buildingRoll.label: Building society roll or reference number
buildingRoll.label-display: If your building society uses a roll or reference number, you need to provide it. You will find it on your passbook.
buildingRoll.hint: If your building society uses a roll or reference number, you need to provide it. You will find it on your passbook.

errors.format: Roll or reference number must only include numbers 0 to 9, letters a to z, hyphens, full stops, spaces, commas, slashes, apostrophes, asterisks, ampersands and brackets.
errors.length: Roll or reference number must be 18 characters or less.
